name: ELEUTHEROMANIA - Desires and fears
description:
The objective of this game is to provide the feeling of eleutheromania (A mad zeal or irresistible craving for freedom.); but most importantly is to make the player enjoy the game, I hope you guys enjoy my game/prototype.

CONTROLS:

  • AWSD : Movement
  • Q/E : Lean (Left or Right)
  • ESC/M: Menu (Game does not stop)
  • TAB: Inventory
  • ALT + ENTER: Toggle Full-screen.

Recommended Requirements:

    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: 64 Bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
    • Processor: INTEL CORE i5-4460
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

IF YOU FIND A BUG IN THIS TEASER, PLEASE DM ME SO I CAN FIX IT

TO DELETE OLD SAVE FILES IS LOCATED ON : C:\Users\(user)\AppData\Local AND DELETE THE FOLDER CALLED "ELEUTHEROMANIA"

PATCH 0.1.4

  • A [TEASER GAMEPLAY] broken game with incomplete graphics and a incomplete scenes, and creepy atmosphere.
  • A hidden meaning [for now] analog story.
  • Open your mind and enter this empty world, and follow the light.

Future Goals: 

  1. Add the completed story. [The Story has already been written]
  2. Controller Input [Almost Complete]
  3. Turn this game into VR. [I have knowledge about VR, but i need to buy VR Gear]
  4. Breaking the 4th wall. [Some features available on the full game already]
  • I hope this can be my many of my first steps to become a (hopefully) successful game developer.
